sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register', templateUrl: './register.component.html', styleUrls: ['./register.component.css'] }) export class RegisterComponent { }

Register

Name is required.
Age is required and must be greater than 0.
Valid email is required.
Phone is required.
Password is required and must be at least 6 characters.
